page.title: 03Summer Evening.Kelvin age 11
page.content:
My sister sat on a chair watching television. My Mum announced that tea was ready and slowly we walked into the kitchen. We ate our food. I went outside and put all the stickers I had on to the numberplate of my B.M.X. bike. I put on the lever grips. I decided again to go up to Andrew's. All the lads were near the shops. We all formed a circle and did tricks. I did a super long track walk, which is putting one foot on the pedal whilst holding the brake and with the other foot you pull the wheel along. All my friends shouted "Radical!" It was getting late so I returned home to Mum, a mug of hot chocolate and bed.
***************************************
